channel.title: How do i get rid of a CSRSSW (CS-R) Trojan
channel.description:
Hey, i've recently got a CSRSSW (CS-R) trojan on my computer. Spybot S & D have tracked it. I've deleted CSRSSW.exe but there's another file there named Syn which was a java file and another file named Runescape. I deleted the runescape one but it wont let me delete Syn.
How do i get rid of this problem? and what free program's can i use to get rid of spyware. I've tried STOPzilla which was a total waste of time and S & D cant find it as a problem yet it is trying to mess up my pc =S
Help please? ;)

item.title: How do i get rid of a CSRSSW (CS-R) Trojan
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

FastBawlz:

NOD32 > *

Seconded. I’ve tried Norton, Kaspersky, AVG, Panda AV, McAfee, and NOD32. NOD32 is the best, by far. It’s lightweight + as reliable as McAfee.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get rid of a CSRSSW (CS-R) Trojan

item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“stormcutter, post:6, topic:234917”]Go here.

http://shop.symantecstore.com/servlet/ControllerServlet?Action=ContentTheme&Locale=en_US&SiteID=symnahho&ThemeID=106300&pbPage=Trialware_en_US&pgm=12858600

Download the norton 360 15 day trial, and then it will most likely remove the virus.[/quote]
Norton is a joke.

Disable your system restore to… As a virus can sometimes come back by going through system restore

spybot search and destroy. Works well for me. After you get it i reccomend unplugging your internet while you scan.
